statements: SELECT * FROM policyholder_payments LIMIT 5;
SELECT policyholder_id, payment_amount FROM policyholder_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policyholder_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT policyholder_id, premium_amount FROM policyholder_payments WHERE premium_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT policyholder_id, payment_amount FROM policyholder_payments WHERE premium_amount = 5000
SELECT * FROM policyholder_payments WHERE billing_information->>'payment_method' = 'credit_card'
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM policyholder_payments
SELECT policyholder_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM policyholder_payments GROUP BY policyholder_id
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE policyholder_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE premium_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT premium_id, premium_amount, premium_date FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 500;
SELECT policyholder_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY policyholder_id;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY premium_date ASC
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' AND payment_date < '2022-03-01'
SELECT * FROM premiums p JOIN payments pm ON p.policyholder_id = pm.policyholder_id ORDER BY p.premium_date DESC, pm.payment_date ASC
SELECT policyholder_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY policyholder_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = '5f3e6f86-c6de-4a78-bc5d-72d5196d3eed';
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT policyholder_id, billing_address FROM billing_info WHERE billing_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE policyholder_id = 'abc-123' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT billing_address FROM billing_info WHERE policyholder_id = 'xyz-456';
SELECT premium_amount, start_date, end_date FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY premium_amount;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payments
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT policyholder_id, amount FROM premiums ORDER BY premium_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM policyholders WHERE phone_number = '555-1234';
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(premium_amount) FROM premiums;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1001;
SELECT policyholder_id, sum(amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM premiums ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT billing_id, bill_amount FROM billing WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY bill_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_email FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT billing_address FROM billing_info ORDER BY billing_id DESC;
SELECT policy_type, policy_start_date FROM policies WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policyholder_name, payment_amount FROM policyholders INNER JOIN payments ON policyholders.policyholder_id = payments.policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY policyholder_name DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_start_date, policyholder_email FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 3;
SELECT policyholder_name, payment_amount FROM policyholders JOIN payments ON policyholders.policyholder_id = payments.policyholder_id;
SELECT policyholder_name, premium_amount FROM policyholders JOIN premiums ON policyholders.policyholder_id = premiums.policyholder_id WHERE premium_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policies.policy_type, COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM policies GROUP BY policy_type;
